document_data.caption: A map showing the Dhaermos Warehouse (labeled #281) on Belnimbra's Street.
document_data.name: Dhaermos Warehouse
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dhaermos Warehouse''' was a storage warehouse in [[Waterdeep]] that was privately owned by [[Lhund Dhaermos]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This warehouse was located along [[Belnimbra's Street]],
document_data.Structure: This warehouse was five stories tall.
document_data.Services: Within this warehouse [[Lhund Dhaermos|Lhund]] would fence exotic creatures and plants, as well as a wide variety of slaves. All of these were sold for 30% of their new-made market price.
